text.div:
Query Responder CapabilityStatement

  • Implementation Guide Version: 0.1.0
  • FHIR Version: 4.0.0
  • Supported formats: xml, json
  • Published: 2020-02-19
  • Published by: HL7 International - Infrastructure and Messaging Work Group

This CapabilityStatement describes the expected capabilities of a server that is capable of responding to a follow up FHIR RESTful query from an Intermediary/Recipient. These Expectations are the same as described in the HL7 FHIR® US Core Implementation Guide STU3 Release 3.1.0 CapabiltyStatement for the US Core Server

SHALL Support the Following Implementation Guides:

  • http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.us.core|3.1.0

FHIR RESTful Capabilities

Refer to the HL7 FHIR® US Core Implementation Guide STU3 Release 3.1.0 CapabiltyStatement for the US Core Server
